last_episode_to_air.name: Eggman: The Video Game Part 2: The End of the World
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sonic and friends must face their most dangerous foes in order to prevent a disaster that is going to destroy the universe.

name: Sonic Boom
overview: The speedy blue hedgehog Sonic with sidekick Tails and pals Knuckles, Amy and Sticks tries to ward off the evil plans of Dr. Eggman, who is hellbent on taking over the world. Sonic faces regular battles with Eggman's henchmen, including loyal robots Orbot and Cubot, evil interns, and giant, robotic monsters.

episodes.name: The Sidekick
episodes.overview: After Tails gets injured during a battle against Dr. Eggman, Sonic, fearing for his safety, fires him and holds auditions for a new sidekick.

episodes.name: Can An Evil Genius Crash On Your Couch For A Few Days?
episodes.overview: Dr. Eggman moves in with Sonic and Tails while his fortress is under repairs. While there, he drives Sonic and Tails to the breaking point with his annoying traits.

episodes.name: Translate This
episodes.overview: Tails builds a translator robot with the unintentional ability to read minds. His friends are not impressed.

episodes.name: Buster
episodes.overview: When Sticks' friends tell her to be nicer to (non-anthropomorphic) animals, she becomes attached to a slime-belching robot dog named Buster.

episodes.name: My Fair Sticksy
episodes.overview: After being invited to a fancy gala, Sticks admits she does not know how to behave like a lady.

episodes.name: Fortress Of Squalitude
episodes.overview: Amy decides to accept Eggman's invitation to design his lair for a magazine cover.

episodes.name: Double Doomsday
episodes.overview: Dr. Eggman hires an new intern to help out around the base, unaware of the intern's true desire.

episodes.name: Eggheads
episodes.overview: Dr. Eggman makes evil cookies to turn Sonic into his lackey, but instead, gets all his friends to work with to destroy Sonic.

episodes.name: Guilt Tripping
episodes.overview: Sonic and Tails rescue some villagers from bandits, but can't get away from the village thanks to all the guilt being thrown onto them.

episodes.name: Dude, Where's My Eggman?
episodes.overview: Cubot and bot wake up with no memory of the last day and no trace of Eggman around anywhere.

episodes.name: Cowbot
episodes.overview: When Tails reprograms one of Dr. Eggman's robots, it becomes a killing machine set on destroying Eggman.

episodes.name: Circus Of Plunders
episodes.overview: In hopes of having new additions to his traveling circus, a ringmaster captures Sonic and his friends.

episodes.name: Unlucky Knuckles
episodes.overview: Knuckles feels that the only reason Sonic always bests him is that Sonic has better luck. So, Knuckles tries to run out his bad luck and reset the luck balance of the universe by constantly putting himself in harm’s way.

episodes.name: The Meteor
episodes.overview: A meteor causes Sonic and Eggman to exchange bodies.

episodes.name: Aim Low
episodes.overview: After losing his confidence, Dr. Eggman gets help from a motivational speaker, and then becomes too reliant on the life coach.

episodes.name: How To Succeed In Evil Without Really Trying
episodes.overview: When Tails' orchard picking machine runs amok, a group of evil scientists believe Tails is one of them.

episodes.name: Don't Judge Me
episodes.overview: After being injured in a battle against Sonic, Egghead decides to take Sonic to court to receive justice.

episodes.name: Dr. Eggman's Tomato Sauce
episodes.overview: When Dr. Eggman markets his own brand of tomato sauce, the others are suspicious of possible ulterior motives.

episodes.name: Sole Power
episodes.overview: Sonic must give up his speed when it causes a deafening tone, but Dr. Eggman may have a remedy.

episodes.name: Sleeping Giant
episodes.overview: Sonic, Tails and Knuckles wake up a sleeping rock giant who begins rampaging.

episodes.name: The Curse Of Buddy Buddy Temple
episodes.overview: Sonic and Eggman must use teamwork and friendship in order to escape from the ancient temple they are trapped in.

episodes.name: Let's Play Musical Friends
episodes.overview: Orbot and Cubot must defeat a living computer virus in the cyber world.

episodes.name: Late Fees
episodes.overview: Sonic realizes he has 7 minutes to return Amy's library book and ends up racing the clock, as he battles slow senior citizens, burger cravings, and an angry Eggman.

episodes.name: Into the Wilderness
episodes.overview: When Sticks insists on being the one to teach Amy survival skills, Sonic and Knuckles challenge them to a race through the jungle.

episodes.name: Eggman Unplugged
episodes.overview: After Sonic and the others use Eggman's technology against him, he swears off technology for good; Lightning Bolt Society unleashes an attack.

episodes.name: Chez Amy
episodes.overview: Amy decides to open her own restaurant which causes a rivalry with their former hang out and Dave the Intern.

episodes.name: Blue with Envy
episodes.overview: A cool new shrew arrives in town, threatening Sonic's status as the town's biggest hero.

episodes.name: Curse of the Cross Eyed Moose
episodes.overview: After seeing a cross-eyed moose, Sticks is convinced that she and her friends are cursed. They set out to find a mystical marmoset who is the only one who can remove the curse.

episodes.name: Chili Dog Day Afternoon
episodes.overview: Knuckles wants to win the village's annual Chili Dog Cook-Off and on his quest to find the perfect ingredients he meets the Pepper People, and their leader Claggerhorn who have been waiting for a savior to bring them the freedom they deserve.

episodes.name: Closed Door Policy
episodes.overview: When Amy realizes that Sticks is a pack rat, she forces her friend to have a garage sale to get rid of all the junk that's accumulated in her burrow. During the sale, a secret locked door to an underground world is removed and an invading horde is set free.

episodes.name: Mayor Knuckles
episodes.overview: When Knuckles is made mayor for the day, he sends the village into chaos. Sonic and friends, and even Eggman, have to band together to stop him from ruining the village.

episodes.name: Eggman The Auteur
episodes.overview: Eggman is making a movie about his life. He even tries to cast Sonic to play a lame version of Sonic. Is this just a bad movie or a merely a diversion for a secret evil plan?

episodes.name: Just a Guy
episodes.overview: After Sonic calls Mike "a normal guy", Amy sets up a seminar to help him develop a more sensitive attitude.

episodes.name: Two Good To Be True
episodes.overview: When another Knuckles from an alternative dimension becomes stranded in their world and causes trouble for Sonic and his friends, the gang must figure out a way to get him home.

episodes.name: Beyond the Valley of Cubots
episodes.overview: When Orbot and Cubot discover a group of rejected Cubot prototypes hiding in the jungle, they seek the help of Sonic and Tails to protect them from Eggman.

episodes.name: Next Top Villain
episodes.overview: Dave the Intern inadvertently takes down Eggman and becomes a true vilain.

episodes.name: New Year's Retribution
episodes.overview: While the rest of the village is celebrating New Year's Eve, Eggman decides to slow down time in order to complete his previous resolution of defeating Sonic... somehow.

episodes.name: Battle of the Boy Bands
episodes.overview: The guys go undercover as a boy band to prove that Amy and Sticks are being brainwashed by a pop icon.

episodes.name: Tails' Crush
episodes.overview: Tails is experiencing a crush; Dr. Eggman has a difficult time picking up his package from the post office.

episodes.name: Bro-Down Showdown
episodes.overview: Sonic and Knuckles enter a best friend game show to win a new couch for Amy, but the show pairs Sonic up with Dr. Eggman.

episodes.name: Late Night Wars
episodes.overview: When Knuckles replaces Comedy Chimp on the Comedy Chimp show, Comedy Chimp elicits the help of Dr. Eggman to steal back the show. Sonic and the gang must save their friend.

episodes.name: Fire in a Crowded Workshop
episodes.overview: When Tails' workshop is destroyed by a fire, Sonic, Knuckles, and Amy each have conflicting versions of how it happened.

episodes.name: It Wasn't Me, It Was the One-Armed Hedgehog
episodes.overview: Dr. Eggman is missing his particle accelerator and all evidence points to Sonic. With the villagers also claiming stolen items, Sonic must find the real thief in order to clear his name.

episodes.name: Robot Battle Royale
episodes.overview: In order to prove that he is an inventor like Tails, Knuckles challenges Tails to enter the local robot battle; little do they know Dr. Eggman has also entered the contest.

episodes.name: No Robots Allowed
episodes.overview: Dr. Eggman is in trouble with his homeowners' association and will stop at nothing to defeat them, even if it means hosting a fancy dinner.

episodes.name: Fuzzy Puppy Buddies
episodes.overview: Amy and Dr. Eggman bond over a tabletop figurine game called Fuzzy Puppies. When the gang finds out, they begin to worry about her safety.

episodes.name: Designated Heroes
episodes.overview: The gang accepts a dare from Dr. Eggman to fight him not as a group but one at a time. Eggman uses each hero's weakness to his advantage.

episodes.name: Role Models
episodes.overview: When Sonic and the gang win an award for being role models, it comes with a price that keeps them from doing their jobs as heroes.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.overview: The gang decides to ride out a storm at Amy's house. Things spiral out of control when they discover Amy's play, portraying her all friends.

episodes.name: Counter Productive
episodes.overview: Knuckles tries to make amends for a past misdeed, but he only succeeds at making things worse.

episodes.name: It Takes a Village to Defeat a Hedgehog
episodes.overview: In his most diabolical plan yet, Dr. Eggman decides to band together with all of Sonic's enemies. Shadow the Hedgehog, joins the fight.

episodes.name: Tommy Thunder: Method Actor
episodes.overview: Sonic lets martial arts action movie star Tommy Thunder follow him around and observe his "hero process" for Tommy's upcoming role. However, things erupt when Tommy's over-the-top ego clashes with Sonic's and he starts to claim credit for the gang's victories.

episodes.name: Spacemageddonocalypse
episodes.overview: Eggman discovers that an asteroid is on a collision course with the planet! It's up to Sonic and his friends to destroy the asteroid.

episodes.name: Nutwork
episodes.overview: Sticks is fed up that all the news is fluff, so with Tails' help, she creates a podcast to speak truth to power. It becomes so popular that the TV news producer decides to fire Soar and replace him with Sticks. But in order to report the truth, Sticks is pressured into toeing the company line.

episodes.name: Alone Again, Unnaturally
episodes.overview: Sonic and Tails are working on an invention to make Sonic even faster. Unfortunately, Sonic goes so fast that he eventually disappears. Tails is nervous. Did he disintegrate Sonic? Meanwhile, Sonic is alone in another plane of existence where he can only see ghostly images of his friends but can't communicate with them. When Eggman decides to attack, the gang battles him while protecting Tails so he can work on a solution.

episodes.name: The Biggest Fan
episodes.overview: Sonic is pestered by Mark the Tapir, who weasels his way into a position as Sonic's assistant. Eventually, Mark crosses the line and captures Sonic and his friends.

episodes.name: Anything You Can Do, I Can Do Worse-er
episodes.overview: Eggman challenges Tails to prove he is a genius by capturing Sonic.

episodes.name: I Can Sea Sonic's Fear From Here
episodes.overview: After a particularly harsh defeat, Eggman comes to the conclusion that he never wins against Sonic because he is always facing him on favorable ground. So Eggman concocts a plan to have Sonic fight him underwater. Motivational speaker Soar the Eagle will have to use all his coaching talents to help Sonic overcome his phobia of the water in order to defeat Eggman.

episodes.name: In the Midnight Hour
episodes.overview: Sticks discovers Dreamcaster, a mysterious figure trying to hypnotize the village in the middle of the night. The gang doesn't believe Sticks, telling her Dreamcaster isn't real and her paranoia is out of control.

episodes.name: Multi-Tails
episodes.overview: Tails takes a failure during a battle with Eggman to heart. He feels that even though he's the smart one in the group, he's just not smart enough to help Sonic and the gang. So he creates a machine to duplicate himself and form a "brain trust." But will he and his duplicates be smart enough to defeat anything that Eggman can come up with?

episodes.name: Strike!
episodes.overview: After a very humiliating defeat at the hands of Sonic and the gang, Eggman returns to his lair and takes out his frustrations on Orbot and Cubot. The robot duo has finally had enough! Down tools! They're going on strike!

episodes.name: The Evil Dr. Orbot
episodes.overview: The good people of the Unnamed Village feel that things have gotten pretty lawless. They figure there's not a lot they can do to stop evil, so they license, regulate, and tax it. Eggman fails the evil test and must wait 90 days to do evil, so Eggman decides to use Orbot as his front. Orbot will get an evil license and Eggman will be the puppet master. But Orbot's ego gets out of control and Eggman must get Sonic's help to defeat The Evil Dr. Orbot.

episodes.name: Knuck Knuck! Who's Here?
episodes.overview: During a fight against Eggman, Knuckles suffers amnesia. His friends try to help, reminding him of his worst blunders via flashbacks. But he becomes more depressed when he learns that he is the last of his kind - the final echidna. Feeling all alone in the world, Knuckles sets out to find a foster family among the Villagers who might be willing to take him in.

episodes.name: Mech Suits Me
episodes.overview: Sonic stumbles upon an ancient mech suit. It makes him more powerful, but soon Sonic becomes dependent on it, and it starts to change his personality.

episodes.name: FiendBot
episodes.overview: Eggman builds a giant new robot to defeat Sonic. He programs it to know everything about the Blue Blur, but things don't go as planned - with all FiendBot's knowledge of Sonic, it doesn't want to destroy him, it wants to be his friend.

episodes.name: Og Man Out
episodes.overview: The gang becomes suspicious when Froglodyte Og comes to the surface world. They fear their suspicions may be correct when a Froglodyte army arrives in The Village.

episodes.name: Knine-to-Five Knuckles
episodes.overview: Knuckles is upset when he wins a lamp in a raffle and it dawns on him that he doesn't have a home in which to keep it. He sets out to rectify the problem by getting a job.

episodes.name: Blackout
episodes.overview: When the Village's power source, the Meroke Chrystal, stops functioning, the gang must go in search of a replacement. They need to solve a series of puzzles in a trap that was built by the ancients to get it.

episodes.name: Unnamed Episode
episodes.overview: When the people of the Unnamed Village find out that their village used to be called "Badgerville" after Sticks' evil ancestor, anti-badger sentiment runs rampant. They decide to rename the town to something more agreeable, and an election is held. Eggman buys votes and is able to rename the village Eggman City, then uses a hidden clause to seize power and become a worse tyrant than Sticks' ancestor. In the end, Sticks saves the day, takes back the village, and renames it Hedgehog Village, after Amy, the friend who stuck by her.

episodes.name: Robot Employees
episodes.overview: Dr. Eggman creates a new line of automated robot workers for Meh Burger. Dave loses his job, being lazy and entitled, and Sticks flees, fearing the "tin death chefs." When Dave joins forces with the Lightning Bolt Society to win back his job, we soon discover that Eggman has evil ulterior motives. This time, Sticks might have been right, and it's up to her to save the entire village.

episodes.name: Give Bees A Chance
episodes.overview: Amy nurses one of Dr. Eggman’s beebots back to health and adopts it as a pet.

episodes.name: Mombot
episodes.overview: Feeling the need for unconditional love, Eggman creates "Mombot." Unfortunately, she's overly critical of everything he does and she's constantly embarrassing him in front of Sonic.

episodes.name: Muckfoot
episodes.overview: Tails sets out to prove that the mythical creature Muckfoot is real.

episodes.name: Nominatus Rising
episodes.overview: Eggman’s nemesis Nominatus is back. With the help of his two virus minions he tries to take over the world… from outside the computer!

episodes.name: Eggman's Brother
episodes.overview: Steve Eggman comes to town, claiming to be Eggman's long lost brother. He wants to fight for good alongside Sonic and the gang.

episodes.name: Do Not Disturb
episodes.overview: An endangered species wanders into Sonic's shack. He can't move the ugly, smelly animal because of a series of government regulations.

episodes.name: Robots From The Sky Part 1
episodes.overview: Mighton and Bolts, two robots from a city in the clouds, think Sonic and the gang are villains because they destroy robots.

episodes.name: Robots From The Sky Part 2
episodes.overview: Robots all over the planet have turned evil. Sonic & Tails travel to the city in the clouds to get help curing the infected robots.

episodes.name: Robots From The Sky Part 3
episodes.overview: Sonic and Tails discover that the City in the Clouds is under the control of evil robots, and it might be Tails' fault.

episodes.name: Robots From The Sky Part 4
episodes.overview: Hypnobot teams up with Dr. Eggman to take over the world, while the entire gang is overwhelmed by hordes of hypnotized, evil robots.

episodes.name: Flea-ing from Trouble
episodes.overview: The gang learns that sometimes the fiercest things come in the smallest packages when Eggman attacks with his tiniest robot yet.

episodes.name: Lightning Bowler Society
episodes.overview: The Lightning Bolts threaten to steal Sonic and the gang’s’ fan base after an intense bowling match.

episodes.name: Planes, Trains and Dude-Mobiles
episodes.overview: The guys are stoked to find out their band, Dude-itude, has booked its first road gig so they hit the road in their new decked-out van.

episodes.name: Sticks and Amy's Excellent Staycation
episodes.overview: With the guys' band away for a gig Amy & Sticks have a girls' weekend. When Belinda hears half the gang is gone, she plans an attack.

episodes.name: Inn Sanity
episodes.overview: Eggman can't pay the tax bill for his trash pickup, so to raise the necessary funds, he must turn his evil lair into a luxury resort.

episodes.name: Mister Eggman
episodes.overview: When it’s revealed that Dr. Eggman is not actually a doctor, he becomes a joke and must go back to school to finish his Ph.D. in evil.

episodes.name: The Haunted Lair
episodes.overview: Thinking his lair is haunted, Eggman sells it to Barker. Sonic and Tails must prove ghosts aren't real.

episodes.name: Return of the Buddy Buddy Temple of Doom
episodes.overview: Unable to use his robots, Eggman employs the Froglodytes to force Gogobas to mine for a crystal that will power his giant new Mech Suit.

episodes.name: Eggman's Anti Gravity Ray
episodes.overview: Eggman’s anti-gravity ray causes chaos in Hedgehog Village. With newfound confidence, Cubot tries to bring enlightenment to the villagers.

episodes.name: Victory
episodes.overview: Sonic challenges Eggman to a game of soccer in order to save the Village's beloved rec center.

episodes.name: Three Men And My Baby!
episodes.overview: When Tails, Knuckles, and Sonic accidentally injure Lady Walrus they agree to take care of her baby, Chumley.

episodes.name: Where Have All the Sonics Gone?
episodes.overview: Morpho sends Sonic to a dimension where he never existed. Sonic must unite his gang and help take back the alternate dimension village.

episodes.name: If You Build It They Will Race
episodes.overview: The gang becomes very competitive with one another when they enter an auto race, using cars they've designed themselves.

episodes.name: Chain Letter
episodes.overview: Sonic agrees to be Dr. Eggman’s friend on social media - a kindness he will surely regret.

episodes.name: Vector Detector
episodes.overview: Amy's hammer has disappeared, and she is lost without it. Vector the detective is on the case.

episodes.name: Three Minutes or Less
episodes.overview: Sonic becomes a delivery boy for Meh Burger, guaranteeing a delivery in less than three minutes, but Eggman gets involved.

episodes.name: Lair on Lockdown
episodes.overview: After accidentally triggering the state of emergency protocol, Sonic, his friends, Eggman, Orbot and Cubot are stuck in Eggman's lair.

episodes.name: You and I Bee-come One
episodes.overview: While Tails tests his teleporter on himself, he finds himself in the body of a Bee Bot. Sonic must figure out how to reverse the process.

episodes.name: Don't Make Me Angry
episodes.overview: After a failed experiment, Eggman transforms himself into an adorable creature every time he gets angry.

episodes.name: Eggman Family Vacation
episodes.overview: Eggman and Steve transform their family vacation in Roboken into a Macchiavelic plan. Mighton and Bolts call Sonic and his friends for help.

episodes.name: Return to Beyond the Valley of the Cubots
episodes.overview: When Tails gives the opportunity to talk to D-Fekt, the little robot joins the Cubots to fight their nemesis, Dr. Eggman.

episodes.name: Eggman: The Video Game Part 1
episodes.overview: When Eggman tries to recruit Shadow to help him bring more evil to his video game, it has dangerous consequences for Sonic and his friends.

episodes.name: Eggman: The Video Game Part 2: The End of the World
episodes.overview: Sonic and friends must face their most dangerous foes in order to prevent a disaster that is going to destroy the universe.
